channel.title: Final PvP Development
channel.description:
Yo, well this is my PVP server, which i resently got from demise, Call me a leech if you really wan't too, it doesn't bother me. This weekend, i will be updating ALOT (if i have enough time) - such as -:
Barrows, pestcontroll, New PK Spot's, such as Castle PK. Acient curse's. Will be fixing claws spec. will be fixing VLS spec. Adding more PVP armours. Maybe Chaotic weps, (not sure yet.) And some more suggestions, from players on my server.
Ok so, this is what is has ATM.
- FULLSCREEN login screen with deaths kills etc - Clue scrolls with rewards that have emotes (like flared trousers) - Full dart system with dragon darts - added a tutorial system with floating text and next/previous buttons - added a multi zone teleport with right click on the npc teleport - added a highscoreboard - Both of those remember your choices - Fixed crossbow glitch - Made a custom EP system - With custom interface as well - At 100% you get artefacts - edited all the shops so it was more suitable for pking - added level changing in pvp zones - added bones on altars - fixed pretty much every single bug in the game - added drag platebody - added staff of light - added arcane stream necklace (fully working) - Perfect combat - PvP tasks - Thats where you have to kill mains zerkers or pures as atask - EP system - Click levelling - Thats where you click stats, enter amount and done - made it so when you buy firecape it costs 0 from the shop afterwards, incase people lose by dc - added barrelchest boss, kbd and chaos ele - added it as a pvp world - added a pvp artifact system - added a pvp drops system - added a pkp system with point bonuses for pvp task kills - fixed the altars - recently, Fix ALL dupe's. - Fix major bug, which made new players not talk, without making a new account.
Pvp Artifact system! [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/242ssk6.png[/img]
Barrel Chest Boss! [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/zwjoz8.png[/img]
Pvp Point Exchange! [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/fu770o.png[/img]
Commands! [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/s31uhl.png[/img]
Server is out atm, i'm not going too give Download links, due to not aloud to advatise on this thread.
SERVER NAME = FINAL PVP.

item.title: Final PvP Development
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

Yo, well this is my PVP server, which i resently got from demise, Call me a leech if you really wan’t too, it doesn’t bother me.
This weekend, i will be updating ALOT (if i have enough time) - such as -:

Barrows,
pestcontroll,
New PK Spot’s, such as Castle PK.
Acient curse’s.
Will be fixing claws spec.
will be fixing VLS spec.
Adding more PVP armours.
Maybe Chaotic weps, (not sure yet.)
And some more suggestions, from players on my server.

Ok so, this is what is has ATM.

  • FULLSCREEN login screen with deaths kills etc
  • Clue scrolls with rewards that have emotes (like flared trousers)
  • Full dart system with dragon darts
  • added a tutorial system with floating text and next/previous buttons
  • added a multi zone teleport with right click on the npc teleport
  • added a highscoreboard
  • Both of those remember your choices
  • Fixed crossbow glitch
  • Made a custom EP system
  • With custom interface as well
  • At 100% you get artefacts
  • edited all the shops so it was more suitable for pking
  • added level changing in pvp zones
  • added bones on altars
  • fixed pretty much every single bug in the game
  • added drag platebody
  • added staff of light
  • added arcane stream necklace (fully working)
  • Perfect combat
  • PvP tasks
  • Thats where you have to kill mains zerkers or pures as atask
  • EP system
  • Click levelling
  • Thats where you click stats, enter amount and done
  • made it so when you buy firecape it costs 0 from the shop afterwards, incase people lose by dc
  • added barrelchest boss, kbd and chaos ele
  • added it as a pvp world
  • added a pvp artifact system
  • added a pvp drops system
  • added a pkp system with point bonuses for pvp task kills
  • fixed the altars
  • recently, Fix ALL dupe’s.
  • Fix major bug, which made new players not talk, without making a new account.

Pvp Artifact system!

Barrel Chest Boss!

Pvp Point Exchange!

Commands!

Server is out atm, i’m not going too give Download links, due to not aloud to advatise on this thread.

SERVER NAME = FINAL PVP.
